description: The Strict-Transport-Security HTTP response header informs the browser that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS for a specified period of time.

response-directives.description: Specifies the time duration in seconds that the browser should remember that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.
Indicates that the policy applies to all subdomains of the current domain.
Indicates that the site should be included in the HSTS preload list maintained by browsers.
